info.name: Draw.io
info.summary: Create and edit diagrams and whiteboards with draw.io
info.description:
Integrates the draw.io (diagrams.net) editor into Nextcloud, letting users create and edit diagrams and whiteboards directly from the Files app.
**Key features:**
- **Real-time collaboration** — multiple users can edit the same diagram simultaneously (requires Autosave and the official diagrams.net server) - **Whiteboards** — freeform .dwb whiteboard files alongside traditional .drawio diagrams - **Dark mode** — automatic or manual dark theme support - **Diagram previews** — PNG thumbnails shown in the Nextcloud file list - **Public sharing** — edit or view diagrams via Nextcloud public share links - **File versioning** — access previous diagram revisions through Nextcloud's version history - **Self-hosting** — optionally use your own draw.io server instead of the official one - **Offline mode** — work without an internet connection using a bundled draw.io instance - **Multilingual** — translated into 99 languages - **Admin controls** — configure theme, language, autosave, libraries, and more from the admin settings panel
info.author: draw.io Ltd
